\index{\-Contour\-Mode@{\-Contour\-Mode}!findContours.cpp@{find\-Contours.\-cpp}}
\subsubsection[{\-Contour\-Mode}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}const {\bf \-Const\-Map}$<$std\-::string,int$>$ {\bf \-Contour\-Mode}}}\label{find_contours_8cpp_a6cf58264f0246471480f8b5333fd93de}
{\bfseries \-Initial value\-:}
\begin{DoxyCode}
 ConstMap<std::string,int>
    ("External",cv::RETR_EXTERNAL)
    ("List",    cv::RETR_LIST)
    ("CComp",    cv::RETR_CCOMP)
    ("Tree",    cv::RETR_TREE)
\end{DoxyCode}


\-Mode of the contour retrieval algorithm for option processing. 

retrieve only the most external (top-\/level) contours retrieve all the contours without any hierarchical information retrieve the connected components (that can possibly be nested) retrieve all the contours and the whole hierarchy 

\-Definition at line 13 of file find\-Contours.\-cpp.
